## About

Neuron Consulting was founded by Dr. David J. Bauer to provide specialized consulting services to graduate students working on their thesis or dissertation.

::: {#alert .alert .alert-dismissible alert-warning}
Dr. Bauer holds a PhD in Psychology from the University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee. With over 10 years of experience successfully guiding graduate students through the research process, he understands the unique challenges these students face.
:::

## Services

Neuron Consulting provides customized support including:

-   Topic selection and refinement
-   Literature reviews
-   Research design assistance
-   IRB application support
-   Quantitative and qualitative analysis
-   Statistical consulting with SPSS, R, etc.
-   Writing and editing services
-   Final proofreading and feedback

Dr. Bauer works closely with each client to provide tailored guidance based on their research topic, methodology, analysis approach, and goals.
